guides.title: Admin Analytics Integration Guide
guides.summary: Complete guide for integrating new API/AI features into admin analytics dashboard with cost tracking and session management.

guides.title: Admin Analytics API Usage Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive technical guide showing how admin analytics service integrates AI and API usage tracking with detailed data flow and response structures.

guides.title: Admin View-Only Implementation
guides.summary: Complete implementation of view-only admin role system allowing designated users read-only admin access with multi-layer security verification.

guides.title: Admin Vector Panel Refactor Summary
guides.summary: Documents the refactoring of AdminVectorContactTestPanel from monolithic component to clean layered service architecture following admin patterns.

guides.title: Admin Service Separation Guide
guides.summary: Documents separation of admin functionality into distinct services (User Management and Analytics) for better organization and scalability.

guides.title: Admin Security Logs Implementation
guides.summary: Implementation of TopLevelSecurityLogs component in admin dashboard for platform-wide security event monitoring without organization context.

guides.title: Admin Security Layers Guide
guides.summary: Step-by-step implementation guide for 7-layer security verification system for admin operations.

guides.title: Admin Refactor Summary
guides.summary: Documents Phase 1 refactoring of admin service from monolithic API routes to clean layered architecture with separated concerns.

guides.title: Admin Dashboard Session Aggregation Fix
guides.summary: Fixes admin dashboard showing zero API/AI usage by implementing dual-write architecture for session-based operations.

guides.title: Analytics Testing Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive testing and debugging guide for analytics click tracking system with browser console logs and network activity.

guides.title: Analytics Service Summary
guides.summary: Documents complete analytics service architecture processing flattened Firestore structure for platform-wide insights and user-specific analytics.

guides.title: Analytics Implementation Guide
guides.summary: Complete technical guide covering analytics system architecture with rate limiting, fingerprinting, session management, and data flow.

guides.title: RGPD Conformit√© Tapit
guides.summary: Complete GDPR/RGPD compliance roadmap and implementation plan for Weavink (Tapit SAS).

guides.title: RGPD Implementation Summary
guides.summary: Complete implementation summary of RGPD Phase 1-2 with consent management, data export, account deletion, and cookie consent.

guides.title: Bot Detection Fix V2
guides.summary: Improved bot detection by including current request in calculations, catching rapid-fire bots with 50ms intervals.

guides.title: Bot Detection Fix V1
guides.summary: Implements multi-factor bot detection using 3 criteria (requests per second, average rate, burst windows) to catch sophisticated bots.

guides.title: Carousel Implementation
guides.summary: Documents multi-carousel support system allowing users to create multiple independent carousels with grouped item structure.

guides.title: Event Grouping Enhancement
guides.summary: Enhances contact timeline by grouping related events (exchanges, follow-ups, meetings) for better readability and context.

guides.title: Enhanced Review Features
guides.summary: Adds structured review system to contacts with ratings, categories, sentiment analysis, and follow-up suggestions.

guides.title: Video Embed Feature Summary
guides.summary: Documents video embed feature allowing users to add YouTube, Vimeo, and custom videos to profiles.

guides.title: Venue Enrichment Feature
guides.summary: Automatically enriches venue/location contacts with details from Google Maps API.

guides.title: Landing Page Redesign
guides.summary: Documents complete redesign of landing page with modern UI, feature highlights, and improved conversion.

guides.title: Real-Time Subscription Updates
guides.summary: Implements real-time subscription updates using Firestore listeners for instant UI synchronization.

guides.title: Cost Tracking Migration Guide
guides.summary: Complete migration guide for refactored CostTrackingService supporting multiple resource types (AI, API) with backward compatibility.

guides.title: Comprehensive Refactoring Guide
guides.summary: Best practices and patterns reference for refactoring Next.js codebase covering components, services, API routes, and state management.

guides.title: Budget Display Implementation
guides.summary: Documents budget information display system showing users real-time monthly AI operation usage and cost budget.

guides.title: Budget Check Usage Guide
guides.summary: Guide for using real-time budget tracking and permission checking system before expensive API operations.

guides.title: Budget Affordability Check Guide
guides.summary: Documents affordability checking system preventing users from exceeding subscription limits.

guides.title: DynamicFields Fix Summary
guides.summary: Fixes dynamic field system for contacts with improved data validation and error handling.

guides.title: Session Tracking Fix
guides.summary: Fixes session tracking issues ensuring proper session lifecycle management.

guides.title: Subscription Revalidation Setup
guides.summary: Documents subscription revalidation system ensuring user tier limits are enforced correctly.

guides.title: Semantic Search Architecture Current
guides.summary: Documents current semantic search architecture using vector embeddings and Pinecone.

guides.title: Quick Start Integration
guides.summary: Quick 30-minute integration guide for new features and components.

guides.summary: Specific refactoring guide for cost tracking service.

guides.title: Rules Grouping Fixes
guides.summary: Fixes for rules grouping system.

guides.title: Rate Limit Testing
guides.summary: Testing guide for rate limiting system with various attack scenarios and verification methods.

guides.title: Rate Limits Collection Guide V1 (DEPRECATED)
guides.summary: Original rate limits collection guide (deprecated - use V2).

guides.title: Rate Limits Collection Guide V2
guides.summary: Complete reference guide to RateLimits Firestore collection with comprehensive field documentation, 21 event types across analytics/privacy/application, multi-threshold bot detection (200ms/500ms/1s windows), and detailed monitoring queries for security event analysis.

guides.summary: Main project README with setup instructions and overview.

guides.summary: Preview/demo documentation.

guides.summary: Project changelog and update history.

guides.summary: Server restart procedures and troubleshooting steps.

guides.title: RGPD Implementation Summary
guides.summary: Complete summary of RGPD Phase 1-4 implementation with consent management, data portability with multilingual export support, breach notifications, compliance features, and multilingual API error messages.

guides.title: RGPD Master Progress Document
guides.summary: Master progress tracking document for RGPD implementation phases, features, testing, and compliance scores.

guides.title: RGPD Phase 4 Summary
guides.summary: Phase 4 implementation summary covering enhanced data portability, automated breach notifications, and compliance monitoring.

guides.title: Consent Implementation Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive guide for implementing GDPR-compliant consent checks with greyed-out buttons and consent popovers in React/Next.js applications. Includes automated test coverage (12/12 passing tests).

guides.title: Anonymous Analytics Plan
guides.summary: Implementation plan for anonymous aggregated analytics tracking for users who withdraw consent, using legitimate interest legal basis.

guides.title: RGPD Testing Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive testing documentation for RGPD Phase 1-4 implementation with 116 tests covering consent, privacy settings, and compliance features.

guides.title: RGPD Testing Quick Start
guides.summary: Quick 30-second guide to running RGPD tests via browser console with one-liner commands for all test suites.

guides.title: RGPD Test Results
guides.summary: Complete test results showing 116/116 passing tests across all RGPD phases with detailed coverage breakdown.

guides.title: Contact Download Settings
guides.summary: Feature implementation allowing profile owners to control who can download their contact information with granular field-level permissions.

guides.title: Onboarding System Guide
guides.summary: Technical guide for mandatory multi-step onboarding wizard with language selection and iPhone-style rotating language headers.

guides.title: CV Features Enhancement Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive implementation of CV/resume features including service-level caching, individual link activation with toggle in appearance page, bidirectional navigation with visual highlighting, document validation with auto-activation, and real-time synchronization. Includes 35 passing tests covering all functionality.

guides.title: Media Features Enhancement Guide
guides.summary: Comprehensive fixes for media upload features including image cropping bug (black images), server validation for modern media types, state management race conditions, and bidirectional deletion between appearance and links.

guides.title: Cost Tracking Service Refactoring
guides.summary: Major refactoring of cost tracking system supporting generalized API cost tracking, session-based tracking, and centralized cost constants.

guides.title: Image Handling Improvements
guides.summary: Fixes three critical image handling issues: IndexSizeError in cropping, white line bug with 'Free' aspect ratio, and incorrect aspect ratio display in carousel items.

guides.title: Tutorial and Account Page Structure
guides.summary: Documents restructured tutorial progression and account page with complete independence between Privacy Overview and Tutorial Progression sections. Tutorial now renders at page level, always visible regardless of active Privacy tab.

guides.title: Build Fix - Import Path and Export Corrections
guides.summary: Fixed critical build errors by correcting import paths in API routes and adding missing function exports in privacy services, enabling successful compilation.

guides.title: RGPD Architecture Compliance Report
guides.summary: Comprehensive refactoring report documenting architectural alignment of RGPD implementation with Weavink 5-layer pattern. Achieved 95% compliance (from 34%), eliminated 12 raw fetch() calls, implemented permission-based security, centralized constants management, and multilingual error translation system. Documents 21 files modified across client services, API routes, server services, translation files, and context layers.

guides.title: Conversation Manager Skill - Implementation Guide
guides.summary: Design and implementation plan for a conversation-manager-skill that automatically saves conversation history from Claude Code sessions, linking them to git commits and enabling smart conversation continuation detection.

guides.title: Documentation Reorganization 2025-11-18
guides.summary: Complete reorganization of project documentation from root directory into structured documentation/ folder with 9 subfolders, updating all skills and tracking systems.

guides.title: Rate Limit UI Pattern - Countdown Timer with Persistent State
guides.summary: Comprehensive guide for implementing a reusable UI pattern for handling rate limit errors (HTTP 429) with real-time countdown timer, greyed-out button, localStorage persistence, multi-tab synchronization, and accurate timing using server's absolute resetTime.

guides.title: Firebase Scheduled Export Cleanup
guides.summary: Automated daily cleanup of expired GDPR data export requests via Firebase Scheduled Functions for GDPR Article 5(1)(c) data minimization compliance.

guides.title: Firebase Audit Log Retention Monitoring (5-Year TTL)
guides.summary: Automated 5-year audit log retention using Firestore TTL with monthly monitoring function for GDPR Article 5(2) accountability compliance.

guides.title: Email Notification System - Manual Test Guide (Phase 1, 2 & 3)
guides.summary: Comprehensive manual testing guide for multilingual email notification system covering i18n bug fixes, account deletion emails, and data export emails. Includes Test 2.2 results (immediate deletion variant).

guides.title: Email Notification System - Bug Fixes Documentation
guides.summary: Documents 3 bugs discovered during email notification system testing: completion email fetch-after-delete bug, Firebase composite index requirement, and contact deletion notifications not updating on completion. Includes root cause analysis, fixes, and verification.

guides.title: Email Integration Guide - Adding New Email Types
guides.summary: Step-by-step developer guide for adding new multilingual email notifications to the Weavink email system. Includes code examples, translation structure, testing checklist, best practices, and cross-reference to API error translation pattern.

guides.title: Account Deletion Technical Flow - User Deletion to Contact Notification
guides.summary: Complete technical walkthrough of account deletion process from User A requesting deletion to User B receiving notifications. Includes 10-phase breakdown, database schema changes, timeline analysis (2-second backend, 5-second email), parallel operations, multi-language handling, and future non-user deletion feature specification.

guides.title: Contact Deletion Warning Implementation Guide
guides.summary: Implementation of comprehensive warning system that notifies users when viewing or editing contacts whose Weavink accounts are scheduled for deletion. Supports both userId-based matching (for Weavink user accounts) and email-based matching (for form-submitted contacts), ensuring GDPR transparency requirements are met.

guides.title: Contacts Component Internationalization
guides.summary: Complete internationalization of ContactCard and EditContactModal components, translating 54 hardcoded English strings across 5 languages (English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Vietnamese) to enable full multilingual support for contact management features.

guides.title: Roadmap & Changelog Feature - Complete Implementation
guides.summary: Complete roadmap/changelog system with git commit parsing, GitHub Issues integration, interactive SVG graph visualization, public page (/roadmap), dashboard integration, category tree structure, and multilingual support.

guides.title: Roadmap & Changelog - Production Specification
guides.summary: Detailed production specification for roadmap system including security considerations, performance optimizations, error handling strategies, and deployment requirements.

guides.title: Roadmap Implementation Checklist
guides.summary: Comprehensive implementation checklist covering all aspects of roadmap feature development, testing, and deployment.

guides.title: Roadmap Gaps and Risks Analysis
guides.summary: Analysis of implementation gaps, known risks, and areas requiring future attention in the roadmap feature.

guides.title: Roadmap Implementation Summary
guides.summary: Executive summary of roadmap feature implementation, key decisions, and final architecture.

guides.title: Contact Deletion Status API
guides.summary: API endpoint documentation for checking if a contact has a pending account deletion, enabling real-time warning displays in ContactCard and EditContactModal components.
